SEARCH
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.g312.application.controller

Class CompleteTaskController

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.g312.application.controller.CompleteTaskController
public class CompleteTaskController extends Object
The CompleteTaskController class handles the logic for completing tasks. It interacts with various repositories to manage tasks, employees, and authentication.

      public void completeTask(Task taskToComplete, String observation, Date endDate)
      Completes the specified task with the given observation and end date.
      Parameters:

      observation - the observation or comments for the task
